Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-30203 affecting package emacs for versions less than 29.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-30203 affecting package emacs for versions less than 29.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package emacs is earlier than 29.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-30203
